titleStmt.title: The copy of a letter sent from the Kings army to a gentleman of worth and qualitie in Suffolk shewing the present condition of the Kings army : intercepted August 28 by the scouts at Cambridge and by them brought to the committee.
titleStmt.author: Crofts, John, 1612 or 13-1670.
Crofts, Henry, Sir.

notesStmt.note: Letter addressed to "Sr. Henry Crofts" and signed: John Crofts.
Imprint from National union catalog pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
